certifications.name: Build a Backend REST API with Node JS from Scratch
certifications.description: Completed a hands-on course on building a Backend REST API with Node.js from scratch, gaining practical experience in creating scalable endpoints, handling requests, and integrating backend services.

certifications.name: CSS, Bootstrap And JavaScript And PHP Complete Frontend and Backend
certifications.description: Completed a full-stack web development course covering CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, and PHP, gaining practical skills in designing responsive front-end interfaces and building dynamic, data-driven backend applications.

certifications.name: Wordpress Web Development for Absolute Beginner Zero to Hero
certifications.description: Completed an intensive training on WordPress Web Development for Absolute Beginners, learning how to build, customize, and manage fully functional websites from scratch using WordPress tools, themes, and plugins.

certifications.name: Search Engine Optimization (SEO) - Online Course
certifications.description: Completed a comprehensive online course on Search Engine Optimization (SEO), gaining practical knowledge in improving website visibility, optimizing content, and driving organic traffic effectively.

certifications.name: How to be you po: Career in Cybersecurity
certifications.description: Completed an insightful course on building a career in Cybersecurity, gaining foundational knowledge in security concepts, threat analysis, and practical strategies for protecting digital systems.
